title: Green synthesis of cadmium oxide nanoparticles (CdO-NPS) using syzygium cumini: exploring industrial applications of CdO NPs as a corrosion inhibitor of mild steel in the acidic environment
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7932-7939
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00560K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sivakumar Sivalingam, Jyoti Kavirajwar, K. Seethalakshmi, Jayagopi Gayathri, A. Roniboss
Potentiodynamic polarization (PDP), electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) and weight loss measurements were used to assess the effectiveness of CdO-NPs as a corrosion inhibitor for carbon steel in 0.5 M H2SO4.
